meanings.sent1: The unmentioned topic was never brought up during the meeting.

meanings.definition: Left out or omitted in conversation or writing.
meanings.sent1: The unmentioned details were crucial for understanding the story.
meanings.sent2: The unmentioned character suddenly appeared in the last chapter.
meanings.sent3: The unmentioned ingredient made the recipe taste strange.
meanings.sent4: Her unmentioned absence was noticed by everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The unmentioned chapter in the book held the key to solving the mystery.
